title: Day 772
content:
# Day 772

In NYC going to a Bitcoin meetup tonight. Excited to pull up to Pubkey again, one of the best Bitcoin bars in all of New York City. Also crushed a run with my buddy Keenan during lunch at work today. Amazing how good exercise makes you feel especially if you're not feeling good.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*p2Y7rAJeH0kD0Zjz2OElLQ.png)

This was the view during the run. Life is good!

Don't have much else to report. Grateful I get to travel, grateful my job allows me to work from anywhere, grateful to be alive at a time where Bitcoin is creating P2P economies and redefining money in a digital age.

Here is to a brighter future!

5/2/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
